AzureBlade: Easy now. You're not a prisoner, except maybe of a false 
personality. There are no Tripredacus here. We are in your true home, 
among your friends and even your lover. Can you feel them?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackStorm:
> 
> "Help me???? but.. I'm a prisioner... I'm a prisioner of 
> Tripedocus"said confused the femme who revealed her form, what was 
> exactly as her body... but with a bright golden eyes intead cyan"It 
> this Tripedocus' base??? if it isn't Where am I?"
> 
>

if
